findings.headline: Coinbase Q4 2025 earnings TODAY - Feb 12, 2026
findings.details: Earnings call scheduled for today. Stock under significant pressure ahead of results: down 27% recently, JPMorgan cut price target from $399 to $290. Multiple Wall Street banks slashing targets citing weaker trading volumes, declining crypto prices, slowing USDC growth.
findings.relevance: Major day for Coinbase/Base. Earnings results will impact ecosystem sentiment and potentially Base metrics/guidance.

findings.headline: Coinbase listing RAVE, DEEP, WAL tokens
findings.details: Coinbase to list RaveDAO (RAVE), DeepBook (DEEP), and Walrus (WAL). Listing effective Feb 11, 2026.
findings.relevance: Continued expansion of Base/Coinbase token offerings.

summary: Coinbase earnings day is the big story. Stock under pressure (-27%) ahead of Q4 2025 results. Multiple analyst downgrades. Also: new token listings (RAVE, DEEP, WAL) went live Feb 11.
action_items: Monitor Coinbase earnings call results today
Watch for Base-specific metrics or guidance
significance: HIGH - Coinbase earnings day impacts Base ecosystem sentiment
